import React from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { authService } from '../../services/api'; const Header: React.FC = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const isAuthenticated = !!localStorage.getItem('token'); const handleLogout = () => { authService.logout(); navigate('/login'); }; return (
Vendor App
Home Products Contact
{isAuthenticated ? ( <> Dashboard ) : ( <> Login Register )}
); }; export default Header;
